variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 9]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA1
variable.description: 1. A. Sleep. How much sleep do you usually get at night (or your main sleep period) on weekdays or workdays? [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA2
variable.description: 2. A. Sleep. How long does it usually take you to fall asleep at bedtime? [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA3
variable.description: 3. A. Sleep. In the past 12 months, how often do you snore while you are sleeping? [Visit 9]
variable.value: Frequently (5 or more nights a week)

variable.name: SLEA4
variable.description: 4. A. Sleep. In the past 12 months, how often do you snort, gasp, or stop breathing while your are asleep? [Visit 9]
variable.value: Frequently (5 or more nights a week)

variable.name: SLEA5A
variable.description: 5a. A. Sleep. How often in the past month you experienced each of the following: have trouble falling asleep [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA5B
variable.description: 5b. A. Sleep. How often in the past month you experienced each of the following: wake up during the night and have difficulty getting back to sleep [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA5C
variable.description: 5c. A. Sleep. How often in the past month you experienced each of the following: wake up in the morning and is unable to get back to sleep [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA5D
variable.description: 5d. A. Sleep. How often in the past month you experienced each of the following: feel excessively (overly) sleepy during the day [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA6
variable.description: 6. A. Sleep. During the past month, how would you rate your sleep quality overall? [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA7A
variable.description: 7a. A. Sleep. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep in each of the following situations: sitting and reading [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA7B
variable.description: 7b. A. Sleep. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep in each of the following situations: watching TV [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA7C
variable.description: 7c. A. Sleep. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep in each of the following situations: sitting inactive in a public place (such as a theater or a meeting) [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA7D
variable.description: 7d. A. Sleep. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep in each of the following situations: riding as a passenger in a car for an hour without a break [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA7E
variable.description: 7e. A. Sleep. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep in each of the following situations: lying down to rest in the afternoon when circumstances permit [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA7F
variable.description: 7f. A. Sleep. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep in each of the following situations: sitting and talking to someone [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA7G
variable.description: 7g. A. Sleep. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep in each of the following situations: sitting quietly after lunch without alcohol [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA7H
variable.description: 7h. A. Sleep. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep in each of the following situations: in a car, while stopped for a few minutes in traffic [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA7I
variable.description: 7i. A. Sleep. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep in each of the following situations: at a dinner table [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA7J
variable.description: 7j. A. Sleep. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep in each of the following situations: while driving [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA8A
variable.description: 8a. A. Sleep. Have you ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that you have any of the following: sleep apnea or obstructive sleep apnea [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA8B
variable.description: 8b. A. Sleep. Have you ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that you have any of the following: insomnia [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEA8C
variable.description: 8c. A. Sleep. Have you ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that you have any of the following: restless legs [Visit 9]

variable.name: SLEAflag
variable.description: Data record present? [Visit 9]

variable.name: VERS
variable.description: FORM VERSION [Visit 9]
